attributes.action: revoke provisions to ban the development, ownership and distribution of so-called "hacker tools"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To Revoke provisions to ban the development, ownership and distribution of so-called "hacker tools" among amendments to the Computer Misuse Act included in the Police and Justice Act 2006. So-called "hacker-tools" are essential to develop and test secure computing systems.
